mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Massie, Harvey
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Grassy Ridge, Lawrence Co., Ohio [Grassy Ridge, Lawrence County, Ohio]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Massie, Harvey Patient Age: 19. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture of the right elbow joint while the arm was at right angle in the act of firing. The bullet entered on the posterior brachial region 2 inches below head of radius passing diagonally across and comminuting the external condyle of the humerus exiting on the posterior humeral region where it lodged- being 2 inches above the external condyle of humerus. Ball extracted on the field. . Location Wounded: In act[ion] at Winchester, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/07/20. Nature of Wound: Conical bullet. Treatment: On the 28th of July, reset the lower arm of the humerus and dis and relocated at the elbow joint .
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Massie, Harvey

Gun shot fracture of the right elbow joint while the arm was at right angle in the act of firing. The bullet entered on the posterior brachial region 2 inches below head of radius passing diagonally across and comminuting the external condyle of the humerus exiting on the posterior humeral region where it lodged- being 2 inches above the external condyle of humerus. Ball extracted on the field.
Private
